item.title: Gingerbread Loaf
item.description: Ingredients… 175g unsalted butter, diced, plus extra for greasing 175g light muscovado sugar 175g black treacle 200ml whole milk 2 large free-range eggs, beaten 250g plain flour 1½ tsp bicarbonate of soda ½ tsp mixed spice 2 tsp ground ginger Method Preheat the oven to 180°C/fan160°C/gas 4. Grease and line a 1.5kg loaf tin. Melt together the butter, sugar and treacle, stirring until the sugar has dissolved. Remove from the heat and stir in the milk.
